Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
divs: sighting detailsabout 15 miles from an airport, my boyfriend and i had noticed a large black triangular shape that appeared to hover about 20 feet over the trees while we were driving. i saw 1 light underneath\front and at that angle i could see some light from the back. as we passed, we noticed there were 3 lights in a straight line on the back of it. it then turned and started moving in our direction and my boyfriend noticed 3 blinking lights in a sequence we had never seen on a plane. it then disappeared behind the trees. the whole time we were looking at it i kept thinking "that is not a plane".
Summary: Hovered over the trees. Three lights in the back and 1 underneath.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Grand Blanc
There were no other sightings in Grand Blanc on or around October 10th 2008
